posts.post_content:
Posted By: John
I found myself with a bunch of extra Danny Murphy's over the years and got a crazy idea to try a full ad run for this player. All the cards I have range from PSA 4-5. 

I'd be up for talking deals on any of the below missing cards I would prefer VGEX to EX but obviously for some I'll take what I can get. I do have a Cycle 460 thanks to a very generous board member and pal, but would like to look for an upgrade. 

Danny Murphy Batting

American Beauty 350 NF 
American Beauty 460 
Broadleaf 460 
Cycle 460 (Upgrade if I can) 
Sweet Caporal 350-460 fact.42 OP 
Lenox (Brown) 
Uzit 
Red Hindu
